message: I propose you take $1000, and I take $9000.  While this might seem uneven, consider that the value of the money decreases each round.  If you decline, you will be making an offer with the money worth less.
Alice, I understand the time pressure, but your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be realistic. This is a much fairer split considering the decreasing value.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but waiting any longer significantly diminishes the value of your share.  I'm proposing a more balanced split of $6500 for me and $3500 for you. This is a fair deal considering the time pressure.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  The value is dropping drastically with each round.  This is my final offer - let's be reasonable and end this.
